programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava) S2 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava»Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure»Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Rebecca Rabbit has a little bother called Richard who is the same age as George. George and Richard each have a toy dinosaur but George and Richard are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows George and Richard that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les petites bêtes) S2 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Les petites bêtes»Papy Cochon montre son jardin à Peppa et George. Il y a plein de minuscules bestioles à regarder...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Delphine l'âne) S3 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Delphine l'âne»Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le correspondant) S2 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le correspondant»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Cache-cache) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache»Peppa and George play hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La montagne blanche) S4 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La montagne blanche»Snowy Mountain: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Cirque de Peppa) S4 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le Cirque de Peppa»Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa and her family are having a picnic lunch. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic together. When it's time to go home, Peppa is having such a good time that, when it's home time, she leaves her teddy behind. But all ends well when Zoë Zebra and Mr Zebra the Postman make a very special delivery to Peppa's house...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa et George s'amusent avec leurs amis au jardin d'enfant. Si Peppa adore faire de la balançoire, George, lui, a le vertige...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Maman Cochon emmène toute la famille à la piscine. Papa Cochon, ravi de cette sortie, déchante quand il est pris pour cible dans le grand bain...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison»Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Excursion en montagne) S2 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Excursion en montagne»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les jeux de plein air) S4 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Les jeux de plein air»Peppa et Suzy doivent jouer dehors mais elles s'ennuient. Papa Pig sort un carton de jeux d'extérieur, mais George est un peu trop petit pour les différentes activités...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le cow-boy) S4 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le cow-boy»Peppa, George, Suzy Sheep, Wendy Wold and Danny Dog visit Pedro Pony who's pretending to be a cowboy. He welcomes them to his cowboy camp. The group imagine they are in the Wild West and do cowboy things, such as eating beans, singing sings, telling stories and sleeping in the tent at night. But even cowboys can get scared, especially when wild animals are lurking outside the tent. The fun goes on until evening, when Peppa and friends need to go home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vilaine Tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vilaine Tortue»Tiddles the Tortoise, Doctor Hamster's pet, has got stuck up a tree, again! Who can save him? (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Polly le perroquet) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Polly le perroquet»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La capsule du temps) S2 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La capsule du temps»Madame Gazelle makes a time capsule with the class. As soon as it is buried, Peppa wants to dig it up again, but Madame Gazelle knows something better. They dig up their parents' capsule when they were little. And that is very funny!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»Peppa et Suzy comprennent que les adultes doivent travailler toute la journée. Elles font alors semblant de travailler dans une boutique à la garderie et trouvent cette tâche épuisante...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur) S2 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur»Mr. Zebra the Postman is delivering the post and today his daughter Zoë is helping him. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. Mummy Pig helps Peppa and George write a reply. They post their reply in the post box and then Peppa and George help Mr. Zebra deliver it all the way to Zoë's house. The birthday party is fantastic fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George's.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa et sa famille sont à la fête de l'école. Le gros lot de la tombola est un voyage en Montgolfière. Peppa gagne : toute la famille apprécie le vol jusqu'à ce que le ballon s'accroche à un arbre...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en train»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Strength) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Shark Strength»Shark Strength: When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength. (S1, ep 16a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu) S6 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu»Mayor Humdinger wants all of Farmer Yumi's honey, but that also brings him a bucket full of bees. Chickaletta goes missing and the Paw Patrol eventually finds her back at the beach.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Banana»Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de Monsieur Fox) S4 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de Monsieur Fox»Granny and Grandpa Pig are celebrating their anniversary, and Peppa and George go to Mr Fox's shop to buy them a present. The shop is full of different things, so siblings don't know what to choose for their grandparents.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Journée Internationale) S4 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Journée Internationale»Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (55/78)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a gift. She leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher discovers the abandoned painting.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue fête le printemps) S2 (15/21)
programme.desc: «Blue fête le printemps»It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: Dora l'exploratrice (Dora's World Adventure) S4 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Dora's World Adventure»Dora and Swiper goes around the world in order to retrieve friendship bracelets.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler»Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la ferme pédagogique) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la ferme pédagogique»Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Snap Pea Stir-Fry: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own. (S1, ep 5b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papy Rabbit dans l'espace) S4 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Papy Rabbit dans l'espace»Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (The Museum) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «The Museum»Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques de boue) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques de boue»It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go outside. When the rain stops, Peppa and George get to play one of their favourite games - jumping in muddy puddles! Things get very muddy indeed when Mummy and Daddy Pig join in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parfum) S4 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Le parfum»Peppa and George are visiting Grampa and Granny Pig. Peppa is amazed by Granny Pig's perfume and gets an idea to make her own. She takes a glass of water and starts picking flowers around the garden. George is not impressed with the smell of it. He makes his own perfume that's very unique.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La peinture) S2 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La peinture»Peppa, George et leur père sont dans le jardin et peignent un cerisier quand un groupe de canard passe et marche sur le tableau...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'armoire à jouets) S2 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'armoire à jouets»Peppa and George have so many toys that they no longer fit in their cleaning basket. That's why Mama Pig decides to buy a toy cabinet with the computer. But then the cupboard has to be put together, and Papa Pig is not very handy ... Hajeto!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le printemps) S3 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le printemps»Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cerf-volant) S1 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Apprendre à siffler) S3 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Apprendre à siffler»Peppa tente d'apprendre à siffler. Elle réalise que tout le monde y parvient sauf elle...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park: Potato City. There they discover that the magic of vegetables never ends. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit bateau) S4 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»The Little Boat: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les bulles) S2 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les bulles»Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Peppa et ses amis passent une journée sur le bateau du grand-père de Peppa...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle voiture) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle voiture»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Grass is Always Greener...) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «The Grass is Always Greener...»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sauvetage Royal) S4 (17/20)
programme.desc: «Sauvetage Royal»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Blaze, policier) S4 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blaze, policier»Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger) S6 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger»An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina) S6 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina»Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (The Supersized Sunflower) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Supersized Sunflower»The Supersized Sunflower: Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? (S2, ep 10a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava) S2 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava»Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure»Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Rebecca Rabbit has a little bother called Richard who is the same age as George. George and Richard each have a toy dinosaur but George and Richard are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows George and Richard that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les petites bêtes) S2 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Les petites bêtes»Papy Cochon montre son jardin à Peppa et George. Il y a plein de minuscules bestioles à regarder...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Delphine l'âne) S3 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Delphine l'âne»Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le correspondant) S2 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le correspondant»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Cache-cache) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache»Peppa and George play hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La montagne blanche) S4 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La montagne blanche»Snowy Mountain: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Cirque de Peppa) S4 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le Cirque de Peppa»Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa and her family are having a picnic lunch. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic together. When it's time to go home, Peppa is having such a good time that, when it's home time, she leaves her teddy behind. But all ends well when Zoë Zebra and Mr Zebra the Postman make a very special delivery to Peppa's house...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa et George s'amusent avec leurs amis au jardin d'enfant. Si Peppa adore faire de la balançoire, George, lui, a le vertige...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Maman Cochon emmène toute la famille à la piscine. Papa Cochon, ravi de cette sortie, déchante quand il est pris pour cible dans le grand bain...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison»Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Excursion en montagne) S2 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Excursion en montagne»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les jeux de plein air) S4 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Les jeux de plein air»Peppa et Suzy doivent jouer dehors mais elles s'ennuient. Papa Pig sort un carton de jeux d'extérieur, mais George est un peu trop petit pour les différentes activités...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le cow-boy) S4 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le cow-boy»Peppa, George, Suzy Sheep, Wendy Wold and Danny Dog visit Pedro Pony who's pretending to be a cowboy. He welcomes them to his cowboy camp. The group imagine they are in the Wild West and do cowboy things, such as eating beans, singing sings, telling stories and sleeping in the tent at night. But even cowboys can get scared, especially when wild animals are lurking outside the tent. The fun goes on until evening, when Peppa and friends need to go home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vilaine Tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vilaine Tortue»Tiddles the Tortoise, Doctor Hamster's pet, has got stuck up a tree, again! Who can save him? (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Polly le perroquet) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Polly le perroquet»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La capsule du temps) S2 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La capsule du temps»Madame Gazelle makes a time capsule with the class. As soon as it is buried, Peppa wants to dig it up again, but Madame Gazelle knows something better. They dig up their parents' capsule when they were little. And that is very funny!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»Peppa et Suzy comprennent que les adultes doivent travailler toute la journée. Elles font alors semblant de travailler dans une boutique à la garderie et trouvent cette tâche épuisante...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur) S2 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur»Mr. Zebra the Postman is delivering the post and today his daughter Zoë is helping him. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. Mummy Pig helps Peppa and George write a reply. They post their reply in the post box and then Peppa and George help Mr. Zebra deliver it all the way to Zoë's house. The birthday party is fantastic fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George's.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa et sa famille sont à la fête de l'école. Le gros lot de la tombola est un voyage en Montgolfière. Peppa gagne : toute la famille apprécie le vol jusqu'à ce que le ballon s'accroche à un arbre...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en train»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Strength) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Shark Strength»Shark Strength: When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength. (S1, ep 16a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu) S6 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu»Mayor Humdinger wants all of Farmer Yumi's honey, but that also brings him a bucket full of bees. Chickaletta goes missing and the Paw Patrol eventually finds her back at the beach.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Banana) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Banana»Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une histoire pour George) S4 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour George»Bedtime Story: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La péniche) S5 (18/52)
programme.desc: «La péniche»Peppa et sa famille vont au musée. Peppa aime bien la galerie des portraits des rois et des reines, alors que George préfère le hall des dinosaures.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le nounours de la garderie) S4 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Le nounours de la garderie»George's New Dinosaur: George pays a visit to Mr Fox's Shop after his favourite toy, Mr Dinosaur breaks. With all the additional features surely Dino Roar is a good replacement?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Stay Over) S1 (n°59)
programme.desc: «The Stay Over»When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything to get him to stop, without disturbing his nap.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le nouveau voisin de Blue) S3 (1/18)
programme.desc: «Le nouveau voisin de Blue»Josh and Blue have some big news - a new neighbour just moved in next door and it's...Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how to help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé) S6 (10/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé»Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green) S2 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green»Paddington Shares A Good Deed: Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington and says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! (S2, ep 14a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret / La partie du lundi) S2 (3/11)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret / La partie du lundi»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur»Goldie's reputation as a great party hostess is on the line when she forgets to buy treats for her guests.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»Switcheroo: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (42/78)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Surprise) S1 (n°43)
programme.desc: «The Surprise»They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Paperplane Race) S1 (n°44)
programme.desc: «The Paperplane Race»Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une nuit mouvementée) S4 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Une nuit mouvementée»Peppa's family are staying at Cousin Chloe's house. After a long day everyone is tired and wants to go to sleep. But baby Alexander's crying is keeping everyone awake!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig places a large order of plastic gnomes and a wishing well for the garden, Peppa and George love them but Grandpa Pig is not happy. He wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»La reine va remettre une récompense à mademoiselle Rabbit, la personne la plus travailleuse de tout le pays. Peppa et ses amis décident de l'accompagner.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S3 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (When I Grow Up) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «When I Grow Up»A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Blaze et le génie de la lampe) S4 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Blaze et le génie de la lampe»Blaze and AJ are driving through the desert when they meet a magical Genie who loves to grant wishes! But when the Genie loses the jewels that give him his powers, Blaze and AJ go on a quest to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs) S4 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Défi des 100 Oeufs»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Attention, boules puantes ! / Les bébés autruches) S6 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Attention, boules puantes ! / Les bébés autruches»There is a strange smell by the swamp that chases all the animals away. Ostriches Oscar and Olivia are expecting chicks, but just before the eggs hatch, an eagle causes trouble.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme) S6 (7/26)
programme.desc: «La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme»Gustavo comes to play the guitar during the campfire concert. Mayor Humdinger also wants to give a concert and is looking for a way to make beautiful music. Yumi's baby goats enter the yoga class and this is how the idea of ??goat yoga arises.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique»Mr. Steel wants to go to the moon and orders Professor Sketch to turn the Steel Tower into a rocket! A magician lures the audience away from Rammy's presentation, who gets so angry that he takes it out on the man's hat.
